be called directly

div.div:
We will offer a time-triggered "online"/"offline" schedule that can be set up be the helper.
Example: A local community offering phone services themselves but only at certain times (e.g. 8am - 4pm).
We offer the same thing but 24/7 and also include a fallback in case the helper is either already in a call or the helper does not want to be called directly right now.
